<template>
    <input type="file" ref="romfile" @change="loaded" />
</template>

<script>
export default {
  name: 'FileDrop',
  props: {
  },
  methods: {
    loaded() {
        const file = this.$refs.romfile.files[0];
        this.$emit('loaded',file);
    }
}
</script>

<style scoped>


</style>
